accessibility.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance (4.5:1 for normal text).
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry and grid offsets.
Use 'Outfit' for all headings and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body text.
Primary color is Deep Navy (#0F172A). Use Wattle Gold (#F59E0B) for CTAs.
Avoid gradients for text. Use them subtly for backgrounds or borders.
All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.
Ensure all images have alt text.
For the AI Dashboard, switch to a 'Dark Mode' aesthetic within the container to differentiate it from the standard accounting tools.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge sonner`
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the custom colors and font families defined in `design_system.typography` and `design_system.colors`.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Update `index.css` to import the Google Fonts.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Create a `Layout` component that wraps the app and handles the Navbar and Footer.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Build the Landing Page using the 'Marketing' grid system and 'Hero' assets.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Build the Dashboard using the 'Dashboard' grid system and 'Cards' components.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_7: Ensure all forms (Login, Register, Contact) use `shadcn/ui` form components but styled with the new design system.
